titleStmt.title: A few words in season to all the inhabitants of Earth being a call unto them to leave off their wickedness, and to turn to the Lord before it be too late.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Elizabeth, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Robert Wilson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
